t: Mealy Amazon | Green Parrot Superstore
s: The Mealy Amazon Parrot (Amazona farinosa) is one of the largest of the Amazon species. The Mealy Parrots are social and can usually be found in pairs or in large flocks. They are even known to interact with other parrots, such as macaws. They are usually quiet, but can get loud at dusk and dawn.
